text: John William Gardner, (October 8, 1912 â€“ February 16, 2002) was an American politician. He served as the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare under President Lyndon Johnson. He was the founder of Common Cause. ==Other websites== * "John Gardner: Uncommon American" PBS documentary * * "John W.
